archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.4.3b: b) collaboration and the sharing of information with approved partners (e.g. through the use of threat information exchanges, Information Sharing and Analysis Centres (ISACs); and peer-to-peer, industry or national group-sharing partnerships).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
